title: Siliņa stands shoulder to shoulder with Zelenskyy in Kyiv
summary_full: Latvian Prime Minister Evika Siliņa is on a working visit to Kyiv, Ukraine, on February 24th to mark four years since the start of the brutal war launched by Russia.
summary_public: Latvian Prime Minister Evika Siliņa is on a working visit to Kyiv, Ukraine, on February 24th to mark four years since the start of the brutal war launched by Russia.

LV.label: positive
LV.evidence: stands shoulder to shoulder with Zelenskyy in Kyiv
